attributes.action: University students reimbursed accommodation fees due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: I do not feel that it is fair to be paying rent when university’s are being closed so students have no need to be living there and also are being advised to go home and self isolate.
attributes.background: Reimburse university students an amount of the rent paid to university accommodation organizations, during the time they were not living there due to self isolation and lock down during The Corona Virus outbreak 2020.
